did.abstract: Correspondence of Cynthia and Mildred Blair, two young girls, with relatives and friends in Randolph County, N.C., and surrounding area. Contains references to social life and religion in the ante-bellum period. A few letters during the spring of 1861 show the anticipation of the outbreak of Civil War hostilities.
